name: Little Dude The Game
description:
After the Devil and the Zombies took over the world, the dudes started a revolution to defeat their tyranny.

Board This 8-bit adventure on killing zombies!

-8 diferent weapons!

-10+ playable characters!

-9 different levels!

Can you defeat the devil and save the world?

Patch Notes:

- Goddman gravity!  Player 2 jetpack's was broken on  the Space  level.
